name: Terence Eden (@Edent@mastodon.social)
summary:
Grrrrr! Trying to get payment from a US vendor. Their form wouldn't submit unless I had a US phone number.
Thank fuck for Google Voice!

Oh, and it's a good thing that I remembered "my" zip code is 90210.

Why don't Americans accept that the rest of the world exists?

(Rhetorical question. Doesn't actually require you to explain anything.)
